reviewText: Saw this on Turner Channel, and I was really glued to the TV.  Didn't want to miss a single scene.  Disappointed when the sheriff was killed in the end.
This DVD was not recognized by me DVD Player (SONY Blue Ray).  Wasted money.  At least it was cheap.
Very pleased with the DVD, a good story and well acted from some of my favorite C&W singers. Plenty of action!
